update construction_progress
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expend_money = #{expendMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
progress = #{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update construction_progress set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expend_money = #{expendMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from construction_progress where del_flag = 0 and project_id = #{projectId} and contract_id = #{contractId}
mapper.update: update construction_progress set del_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
